publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1705 Karen Whitefield: The United States of America—That the Parliament notes that the United States of America is the largest foreign investor in Scotland; further notes that, for over twenty years, this special relationship has created wealth for the people of both countries; believes that the Democratic nominee, Senator John Kerry, has the best economic and social policies for both the United States and its foreign partners, and wishes him well in his attempt to defeat the Bush administration in November.

S2M-1705 Karen Whitefield: The United States of America—That the Parliament notes that the United States of America is the largest foreign investor in Scotland; further notes that, for over twenty years, this special relationship has created wealth for the people of both countries; believes that the Democratic nominee, Senator John Kerry, has the best economic and social policies for both the United States and its foreign partners, and wishes him well in his attempt to defeat the Bush administration in November.
S2M-1705 The United States of America (lodged on 16 September 2004) Margaret Jamieson*, Kate Maclean*, Helen Eadie*, Stewart Stevenson*, Dr Elaine Murray*, Marilyn Livingstone*, Mr Alasdair Morrison*
S2M-1705 The United States of America (lodged on 16 September 2004) Jackie Baillie*
S2M-1705 The United States of America (lodged on 16 September 2004) Mr Kenneth Macintosh*, Scott Barrie*, Trish Godman*
S2M-1705 The United States of America (lodged on 16 September 2004) Mike Watson*
S2M-1705 The United States of America (lodged on 16 September 2004) Mr Adam Ingram*
